title: Faramir's Bow (4R118)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Ranged Weapon
Game Text:	Bearer must be Faramir. He is an archer. Skirmish: If Faramir is skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, exert Faramir to wound that minion.
Lore:	”'Were I as hasty as you, I might have slain you long ago.'”
Rarity:	R
